resume.description: I am a Full-Stack web developer with 9 years of experience. I'm proficient in Typescript & Javascript technologies (mainly Node + React). I worked in teams on B2C + back-offices products, up to 5 millions yearly active users. I'm keen on data (NoSQL/SQL + GDPR) and ops subjects.

merge.title: Merge GPX files
merge.description: You select a few activites in a GPX format and I will merge them into one. You will then be able to analyse it with the analyse tool.
merge.inputLabel: Specify a name for your merged GPX activity

analyse.title: Analyse GPX file
analyse.description: Import a GPX activity file and get a crude Strava like dashboard to analyse it. I will not store it.
